data.title: Arizona Christian University Business Majors
data.meta_description: If you're thinking about majoring in business at Arizona Christian University, check out this information on the school's rankings, student diversity, acceptance rates, and more.
data.text:
Arizona Christian University Business Programs

Located in Glendale, Arizona, Arizona Christian University is a private not-for-profit institution. Glendale is considered a suburb and offers tranquility and safety near the excitement of a city center.

Where Is Arizona Christian University?

Contact details for Arizona Christian University are given below.

Contact Details Address: 1 W. Firestorm Way, Glendale, AZ 85306-3216 Phone: 602-489-5300 Website: arizonachristian.edu Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/arizonachristianuniversity/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/acuphoenix

How Do I Get Into Arizona Christian University?

You can apply to Arizona Christian University online at: arizonachristian.edu/apply/

Admission Requirements for Arizona Christian University

Submission Required? High School GPA 1 High School Rank 3 High School Transcript 1 College Prep Program 3 Recommendations 5 SAT or ACT Scores 5 TOEFL 1

How Hard Is It To Get Into Arizona Christian University?

Arizona Christian University has an acceptance rate of 70%, which means that is not quite as selective as some other schools. Still, you'll need good grades and a solid application if you want to be admitted.

Approximately 63% of accepted students are men and 37% are women. The acceptance rate for men is 67%, and the acceptance rate for women is 76%.

Can I Afford Arizona Christian University?

The overall average net price of Arizona Christian University is $34,485. The affordability of the school largely depends on your financial need since net price varies by income group.

The net price is calculated by adding tuition, room, board and other costs and subtracting financial aid.

Student Loan Debt

While almost two-thirds of students nationwide take out loans to pay for college, the percentage may be quite different for the school you plan on attending. At Arizona Christian University, approximately 93% of students took out student loans averaging $6,401 a year. That adds up to $25,604 over four years for those students.

Arizona Christian University Undergraduate Student Diversity

There are 1,053 undergraduate students at Arizona Christian University, with 876 being full-time and 177 being part-time.

Gender Diversity

Of the 876 full-time undergraduates at Arizona Christian University, 63% are male and 37% are female.

Racial-Ethnic Diversity

The racial-ethnic breakdown of Arizona Christian University students is as follows.

Race/Ethnicity Number of Grads Asian 11 Black or African American 87 Hispanic or Latino 248 White 403 International Students 31 Other Races/Ethnicities 96

Geographic Diversity

Arizona students aren't the only ones who study at Arizona Christian University. At this time, 13 states are represented by the student population at the school.

Over 25 countries are represented at Arizona Christian University. The most popular countries sending students to the school are Spain, Brazil, and Canada.

Online Learning at Arizona Christian University

In 2022-2023, 180 students took at least one online class at the school.

The following chart shows how the online learning population at Arizona Christian University has changed over the last few years.

References

*The racial-ethnic minorities count is calculated by taking the total number of students and subtracting white students, international students, and students whose race/ethnicity was unknown. This number is then divided by the total number of students at the school to obtain the racial-ethnic minorities percentage.
